name: Project E-L30N Demo
description:
Kidnapped and experimented on, you try to escape your new home in hopes of seeing your friends and the world again in this top/down shooter.

After having been the third iteration of a human enhancement program, Elon must escape from the Meridian foundation while evading the onslaught of guards and experiments. If he can, he must decide if he wants to save his own life or go back and save his friends Terry and Jacob.

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Dash movement

Left Click - Shoot
